short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggests a right domain when you misspell it in an email address.
short.fr: Suggère un domaine correct quand vous l'avez mal orthographié dans une adresse e-mail.
short.ja: ユーザーが間違えてアドレスを入力した際に正しいドメインを表します。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When a user types in "user@hotnail.con", Mailcheck will suggest "user@hotmail.com".

This extension uses the javascript library mailcheck.js

------------------------------------------------

Changelog:

1.6
- Dropped Zepto dependency in favor of jQuery
- Upgraded to MailCheck 1.1.0
- Upgraded to Chrome UI bootstrap 1.4.0
- Used minimalistic bootstrap

1.5
- Localized options page

1.4
- Added tooltips
- Fixed bugs on options page

1.3
- Fixed minor bugs
- Added more options

1.2:
- Added options page

1.1:
- Added i18n support (English, French, Japanese)
- Switched to Zepto JS library
- Fixed bug on form loaded dynamically

1.0:
First release.

For full details (or contribution), please go to http://github.com/mbilbille/chrome-mailcheck
